content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  September 08 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Brunswick Corporation's (BC) Issuer Default Rating (IDR) at 'BBB'. Fitch has also affirmed BC's senior unsecured revolver and senior unsecured notes at 'BBB'. The Rating Outlook is Stable. KEY RATING DRIVERS Downturn Cushion: BC took steps since the last recession to reduce operating leverage and improve its financial health. The business mix is less exposed to materially cyclical
name: Brunswick Corporation
title: Fitch Affirms Brunswick's IDR at 'BBB'; Outlook Stable

content: CHICAGO CSX Corp   the No. 3 U.S. railroad  said it expects earnings per share to be flat in the third quarter compared with the same period last year  despite an expected drop in coal freight volumes of 15 percent.
name: Brunswick Corporation
title: CSX sees third-quarter EPS flat despite 15 percent coal freight drop

content: CHICAGO No. 3 U.S. railroad CSX Corp  on Tuesday reported a higher quarterly net profit  beating forecasts as productivity gains and lower fuel prices offset a drop in coal volumes that took a bite out of revenue.
name: Brunswick Corporation
title: CSX beats profit forecast on cheaper fuel  productivity

content: CHICAGO CSX Corp   the third-largest U.S. railroad  on Tuesday reported a higher quarterly profit that was in line with analyst expectations and said it expected a strong increase in its freight business and double-digit earnings growth during 2015.
name: Brunswick Corporation
title: CSX profit up  expects double-digit earnings growth in 2015
